text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the HIDevolution MSI GE73 Raider RGB 8RE 17.3” FHD 120Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.6 GHz i7-8750H, GTX 1060, 16GB DDR4/2400MHz RAM, SATA 256GB SSD + 1TB HDD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the HIDevolution MSI GE73 Raider RGB 8RE 17.3” FHD 120Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.6 GHz i7-8750H, GTX 1060, 16GB DDR4/2400MHz RAM, SATA 256GB SSD + 1TB HDD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the HIDevolution MSI GE73 Raider RGB 8RE 17.3” FHD 120Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.6 GHz i7-8750H, GTX 1060, 16GB DDR4/2400MHz RAM, SATA 256GB SSD + 1TB HDD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HIDevolution MSI GE73 Raider RGB 8RE 17.3” FHD 120Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.6 GHz i7-8750H, GTX 1060, 16GB DDR4/2400MHz RAM, SATA 256GB SSD + 1TB HDD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Fortnite. The build quality of the HIDevolution MSI GE73 Raider RGB 8RE 17.3” FHD 120Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.6 GHz i7-8750H, GTX 1060, 16GB DDR4/2400MHz RAM, SATA 256GB SSD + 1TB HDD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
